publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1839 Rosie Kane: Opposition to Scottish Executive Funding of Talisman Energy Inc. Windfarm—That the Parliament condemns the decision of the Scottish Executive to allocate £3 million for an offshore wind farm to Talisman Energy Inc., a company that has been associated with human rights abuses in Sudan, including killing, bombing and looting, in order to open up oilfields; applauds the actions of the Presbyterian Church of Sudan and 15 other tribesmen and women, who claim they were forced from their homes in and around Talisman oil fields, in bringing a human rights case against Talisman; calls on the Executive to review its funding procedures and criteria as a matter of urgency, and further calls on the Executive to initiate the development of ethical criteria as a priority for all future planning and funding decisions.
